pl.ais.commons.domain.specification.composite

Interface CompositeSpecification<C>

  • Type Parameters:
    C - determines the type of candidate
    All Superinterfaces:
    Specification<C>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndSpecification, NotSpecification, OrSpecification

    public interface CompositeSpecification<C>
extends Specification<C>
    Defines the API contract for composite specification.
    Since:
    1.0.1
    Author:
    Warlock, AIS.PL

        Specification<C>[] getComponents()
        Returns the components building this specification.
        Returns:
